title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run and manage large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple REST & Python/JS API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push and list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node, Deno & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that exposes Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoints) packaged in a single Docker container.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for browsing, downloading and chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s chat sidebar using the OpenAI-compat endpoint.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands with per-user quotas and moderation.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor and explain code using Ollama models via a side-panel or inline suggestions.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver extension that adds SQL autocomplete and natural-language → SQL using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to summarize notes, generate flashcards and answer questions with Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for building local LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command and DM chat with configurable model per channel.

title: ollama-mistral-7b-better
summary: Official Ollama Modfile and quantized Mistral 7B Instruct v0.2 optimized for local consumption.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app template that streams Ollama responses with session memory and model selector.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from the OpenAPI spec; chat, generate, embeddings, pull & push.

title: r/ollama — Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing new models, tools, integrations and troubleshooting around the Ollama ecosystem.
